word:
Our Saviour took up the true relationship of a human being as the Son of God. We are sons and daughters of God. . . . We must follow where Christ leads the way. For 30 years He lived the life of a perfect man, meeting the highest standard of perfection (The SDA Bible Commentary, Ellen G. White Comments, vol. 5, pp. 1085,1086). 
                                                                           97
